title: HELP LAST CARD NEEDED - T205 John Kling
author: Tcards-Please

posts.post_title: HELP LAST CARD NEEDED - T205 John Kling
posts.post_content:
Thanks to everyone that has helped me along the way.  Started this endeavor in Nov 2007 with a raw Jennings ( liked the name :D ) and see the finish line.  I'm down to the last card needed.  I'm not picky, raw or slabbed in VG condition or better.

Will post pictures of completion.

John Kling

r/
Frank
